title: Learn more about Plastic Free July from the Environment Agency
categories: North East, Yorkshire and the Humber

content.text: Plastic Free July is a global movement that helps millions of people be part of the solution to plastic pollution.

Join an Environment Agency webinar to find out how reducing your avoidable plastic waste can help you tackle the climate emergency. During the webinar you will hear from the plastics and sustainability team, the climate change team, and the sustainable business team. Plus, learn about what you can do to reduce your plastic footprint by taking part in a Plastic Free July bingo challenge.
This is part of the Interreg-funded Preventing Plastic Pollution project.
